website_summaries.verdict: Whether for work, the streets, or a trip, the UGG Olli completes the casual look. Its aesthetics give a cool and smart look that can effortlessly match with most casual outfits, assuring praises from others.Just like other UGG sneakers, the overall construction of this high-top features optimum support and comfort, boosting the appeal of this sneaker and allowing users to wear it all day long.
pros: The UGG Olli offers excellent comfort on foot, which left most users in awe
Some people give this high top shoe a thumbs up for the optimum support it provides in the ankle area
The sneaker has two closures, which are the laces and the zipper, which make it easier for most users to put on and off quickly
Several reviewers note that the shoe feels warm on their foot and is perfect for the fall season
Simple yet stylish is what best describes the sneaker, according to some reviewers
The Olli comes in colorways that match well with jeans or skirts, gaining users multiple compliments from their colleagues
Many reviewers love the sneaker and are willing to buy another pair or recommend it to a friend
cons: Some purchasers find the shoe running a bit narrow, especially on those with wider feet
Several reviewers note that the footbed lacks arch support, which makes it flat

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on outside of shoe is a problem
customer_reviews.text: While I usually like all UGG products, these sneakers are a little different. They run a little large and the zipper to help get in and out of them really belongs on the inner ankle of the shoe instead of the outer ankle. I have UGG leather work boots from a few years ago with the inner ankle zipper and that zipper works much better and is not as awkward as the one on these sneakers. Other than zipper problem, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyneth Allen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’m religiously a size 10. I own 3 other styles of Uggs in a size 10. I bought these in a size 10. As expected, they fit perfectly. The shoes are everything I wanted. A solid black high top that is sleek and comfortable. Honestly I don’t even know why I bother with other shoes. The comfort level of Uggs is nearly second to none.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: While the Olli is well made and looks cute in photos, it did not look good on me. It made my feet look big and rather flat. It was not the look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size bigger to give room to my costumize insoles.... so comfy and stylish . Great sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: crisel

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: True to size, not too heavy and so so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Really comfortable. I want a pair in grey now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES!! 💗
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes! They’re super comfortable and I get a lot of comments on them! I love the color and they fit nicely! I have wife feet and they’re perfect for me! I would definitely recommend them for sure! I really want another pair in black! Lol 💕
customer_reviews.author: Sara DeClercque

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these shoes! They are so cute and so comfortable. I have gotten so many compliments on this pair! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mgnz

customer_reviews.title: Fun shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is fun! It is not lined like Ugg boots, and I ordered a half size larger than I usually wear in Uggs, and I love them. The zipper on the side enables me to slip in and out of them without retying them. There is not support in them but I don’t expect Uggs to have that. So, Uggs fan that I am, I love these!
customer_reviews.author: ReMarion

customer_reviews.title: Just GREAT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are UGGS, what more can I say! I have not worn a UGG boot, shoe, or sneaker that was not comfortable, and put together well for my journey's due to I never let grass grow under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: polite154

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pair of casual shoes!
customer_reviews.text: As expected of a new shoe, it is made a little snug around the foot just before the toes. I also loosened the strings a bit to allow for additional comfort. Otherwise, these shoes are even better looking in person and probably the most comfortable shoe I now own. Item arrived well packaged, brand new and fast shipping!! I fell in love with this pair on UGG's website, however they sold out of my size fairly fast before I could place my order!! Ladies, these shoes are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Latrice Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers but it feels more like a boot than sneakers. They are a bit heavy and they make my feet look bigger than they really are, but the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are very comfortable. Second, they are very cute and trendy. The only problem I have is the white sole is so thick but these days I am hard-pressed to find a pair of fashion sneakers that don't have that look. It seems like all sneakers are like this lately. It looks good though!
customer_reviews.author: Digna E. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Cute Uggs with fashion swag
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Mom since she loved mine so much. Ugg never disappoints with quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg these shoes are amazing. Very comfortable and stylish. I get so many compliments! They do run big so go half a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Comfy, Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My wife rocks these! Got these for my wife's birthday. They look good on her. She totally rocks these.
customer_reviews.author: Junglist Killah

customer_reviews.title: Not sure is shoe is too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but shoe is a bit heavy. Haven’t worn long enough to tell if comfy. Only wore to test around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoes is very uncomfortable on my toes
customer_reviews.author: marjorie goland

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES I'VE EVER WORN!
customer_reviews.text: MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES EVER! PURCHASED 2 PAIRS! CUSTOMER FOR LIFE.....💖
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: A little hard at the beginning like almos all new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sukey Bodu

customer_reviews.title: Not only look good, but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love Uggs and I was not disappointed with this purchase.. They fit true to size. I would this shoe, especially if you do a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Murphy , Sisters N Sync Book Club

customer_reviews.title: Same size women buy with the ugg boots is the same sizes you need too buy In Ugg sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to put on and off. I wear them to work casual and dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to walk around and look stylish. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paromita Sen

customer_reviews.title: Ugly - sorry Ugg, love most of your stuff but not these!
customer_reviews.text: Thought they looked bulky and ran large. Not true white color.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Oliver

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: awesome shoes but make my feet sweat like a mofo. i work all day on my feet so could be why.... well my other shoes don't so yeah after like three wears they got smelly haha.
customer_reviews.author: Conny Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Gives blisters
customer_reviews.text: These shoes gave my daughter blisters in the heel area. They look great but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Stocks

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: In love with this shoe...true to size and super comfy! Easy on and off with the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Trena Tweed

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and comfort of this shoe, they will be great for being on my feet all day as a teacher
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boots, really soft leather, but unlike other reviewers I found these came up small - I’m pretty much always a standard size 5, but couldn’t have worn these in a 5 as toes could feel the end. Sadly the size 6 is £35 more with £8 postage (instead of free) so I won’t be reordering, which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are SO cute!! I’ve been wanting some shoes that are similar, but finding ones “feminine” has been a little difficult. I ordered these with Amazon Prime Wardrobe to see if they’d work for me, and would definitely recommend doing the same if you’re worried at all. They fit true to size, and I highly recommend trying them!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cool
customer_reviews.text: So love these shoes with the exception of the right foot at top of zipper there is something that just bites into my ankle, have to wear high socks and a bandaid. Left foot doesn't do this so it's a defect in the zipper or stitching. Otherwise they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hotsy Malone

specifications.Manufacturer: Deckers Europe Ltd trading as UGG
